actions.text: On agreeing to the Edwards amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A059) offered by Ms. Edwards to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A059) offered by Ms. Edwards to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Edwards amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment gives USDOT authority to appoint and oversee the four Federal members to the WMATA board rather than continuing with the current GSA responsibility to make such appointments.
purpose: An amendment No. 18 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to give USDOT authority to appoint and oversee the fed board members to the WMATA board, while currently GSA has this responsibility.
